title: Getting to Know You
description:
Jeff Gandell, Jillian Richardson and Samuel Routh share stories about intimate relationships that got really interesting, really fast.

Support RISK! on Patreon at Patreon.com/RISK

author: Kevin@RISK-show.com (The Go! Team, Jeff Gandell, Jillian Richardson, Femi Kuti, Samuel Routh, Siôn Russell Jones, Kevin Allison, Jeff Barr, Brett Dennen)
